_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The arising, continuation, rebirth, and: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the eye
The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the ear
The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the nose
The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the tongue
The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the body
The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the mind
The cessation, settling, and ending of t: The cessation, settling, and ending of the eye
The cessation, settling, and ending of the ear
The cessation, settling, and ending of the nose
The cessation, settling, and ending of the tongue
The cessation, settling, and ending of the body
The cessation, settling, and ending of the mind
